page.title: 03COMMUNITY PROJECT IN ACTION
page.content: The most successful aspect of the community project has been the minibus which has taken the children on many outings, and the parents on shopping expeditions etc. Parents who already worked within the school now have a meeting place funded by the project and this has proved very popular as this is a much needed facility in Ruchazie. Very recently a{Home-maker}was added to the staff. Her job involves working in the homes of families experiencing difficulties in basic home management. The success of this in turn is hoped to prove beneficial to the children and therefore to the school. Links between education and social work have so far failed to develop as was first hoped due to the different expectations of each discipline.
